short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clear History and Web Cache is a useful plug-in that helps you quickly clear data from your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you're a frequent user of the internet, you might have experienced the frustration of a slow and sluggish browser. Pages take too long to load, tabs take forever to switch, and even simple actions like scrolling or clicking seem to take an eternity. But don't worry, there are ways to fix this issue and get your browser up to speed.

One of the most effective ways to speed up your browser is by cleaning its cache, history, and cookies. This will not only free up space on your device but also protect your privacy by removing any traces of your browsing activities. And the best part is, you don't have to do it manually anymore!

Introducing our browser extension, designed to clean your browser data with just one click. Our software is a simple and efficient utility that will instantly remove your browsing history, cookies, saved passwords, and form data. This means that you don't have to spend time going through your browser settings or searching for the right options. With our extension, you can clean your browser in seconds and enjoy a faster, smoother browsing experience.

Our extension comes with a few key features that make it a must-have for anyone who wants to speed up their browser and protect their personal data. For instance, you can delete cookies and other site and plugin data, which can significantly improve your browser's performance. You can also clear your saved passwords and form data, which will not only speed up your browser but also protect your sensitive information from prying eyes.

In conclusion, if you're tired of a slow and sluggish browser, our browser extension is the solution you've been looking for. It's easy to use, efficient, and effective, and it will help you make the most out of your browsing experience. So why wait? Download our extension today and enjoy a faster, safer, and more enjoyable browsing experience!
